title: Rupert Grint Gets Confused With Ed Sheeran So Much, He Now Just Plays Along

youtube.com ID: 10657963 3. And it’s not just the everyday folk who are confusing the famous pair — British singer Leo Sayer even got the two confused! Naturally, Not Ed Sheeran just played along with the mistake: View this image ›
